p: Groups of 4 female outbred BALB/c mice, aged 6 weeks at the start of the experiment, were inoculated with 100 PFU of parental virus or infectious clones thereof or diluent alone i.p. Mice were euthanized at day 7 p.i and brains were recovered. Tissues were fixed in 10% neutral buffered formalin, dehydrated and embedded in paraffin. Tissue sections (4 Âµm) were prepared and stained with hematoxylin, eosin and saffron.
